snippet: Newt Gingrich received $1.6 million to $1.8 million from Freddie Mac for providing strategic advice, Bloomberg News reported.
abstract: Newt Gingrich is on the defensive following report that he earned $1.6 million to $1.8 million while consulting for mortgage giant Freddie Mac, which has since been taken over by the federal government.

headline.main: Gingrich on Defensive Over Freddie Mac Fees
headline.print_headline: Gingrich on the Defensive Over Hefty Freddie Mac Fees

byline.original: By JIM RUTENBERG and JEFF ZELENY

snippet: Decide.com now has a mobile app for the iPhone that has the price predicting abilities of the Web site and a few other features that might make buying electronics a little more reassuring.
abstract: Decide.com now has a mobile app for the iPhone that has the price predicting abilities of the Web site and a few other features that might make buying electronics a little more reassuring.

snippet: Google Music will sell individual tracks as well as full albums, letting customers store the files in "cloud" accounts. Customers will be allowed to share music by offering friends one free chance to listen to any purchased track.
abstract: Google Music will sell individual tracks as well as full albums, letting customers store the files in "cloud" accounts. Customers will be allowed to share music by offering friends one free chance to listen to any purchased track.

headline.main: Google Opens a Digital Music Store

snippet: As users embrace iPhones and other smartphones as cameras, attachments have made it easier to get professional-looking photos.
abstract: Smartphone users are increasingly using iPhones and other phones as cameras; dozens of new inexpensive attachments make it easier to get professional-looking photos.

headline.main: Say, Can You Make Phone Calls on That Camera?
headline.print_headline: Say, Can You Make Phone Calls on That Camera?

snippet: A comment to a French Web site indicates that a Windows 8 tablet from Nokia will be coming this June. But Microsoft's delay in attacking the mobile business market has cost it revenue and market share. All this raises the question: Why must iOS an...
abstract: A comment to a French Web site indicates that a Windows 8 tablet from Nokia will be coming this June. But Microsoft's delay in attacking the mobile business market has cost it revenue and market share. All this raises the question: Why must iOS and Android users wait for Windows?

headline.main: Where Is Microsoft's Office for Tablets?

snippet: The recent rise in borrowing costs is going to make it a tough transition for Spain’s next government.
abstract: Reuters BreakingViews column observes the recent rise in borrowing costs is going to make it a tough transition for Spain's next government; notes Apple has rightly decided to keep the roles of chairman and chief executive split.

byline.original: By FIONA MAHARG-BRAVO, NEIL UNMACK and ROBERT CYRAN

snippet: Drinks that are brown and warming but not too heavy to drink before the feast.
abstract: Drinks that are brown and warming but not too heavy to drink before the feast.

headline.main: What Are Some Festive Cocktails That Are Easy to Make for a Big Group?

snippet: For a pre-cornucopia cocktail to get the gathered into a convivial mood, the temptation is to go with something brown and warming. It's fall, there's a nip in the air, and a harvest-like scene awaits on the table. Something in the whiskey or Port ...
abstract: For a pre-cornucopia cocktail to get the gathered into a convivial mood, the temptation is to go with something brown and warming. It's fall, there's a nip in the air, and a harvest-like scene awaits on the table. Something in the whiskey or Port family seems in order. But you've got a heavy dinner ahead of you. The last thing you need is an equally heavy drink. With that in mind, here a few recommendations that split the difference.

headline.main: What Are Some Festive Cocktails That Are Easy to Make for a Big Group?
